text: [Add From Camera Roll] Figured out that iOS's baked-in "scale & crop" editor won't accept custom size/aspect ratio, so we'll need to handle scale & crop in a custom view controller. Not a real problem, just not the solution I was hoping for.

Also learned that even though it works as a modal in iPad, it's highly recommended to display the image picker as a "popover" (think: speaking bubble/callout). This will circumvent the orientation problem I identified last Friday.
I'm headed home to meet the fridge repairman. I'll be online all afternoon, feel free to reach out with questions or ideas!
